author: Ms. Thúy
description: Thử thách 30 câu hỏi từ vựng - Trình độ B2

questions.q: The garden is ________ by a tall wooden fence.
The hotel ________ clean towels for all guests every morning.
After the war, the people finally enjoyed a long period of ________.
We went ________ in the clear blue water to see the coral reefs.
The ________ ruled the land with kindness for over forty years.
People go to the ________ to pray and find quiet time.
This tall building is a famous ________ that helps people find their way.
Christopher Columbus wanted to ________ a shorter route to India.
The ________ of the historical document was not understood for years.
The castle was protected by a deep ________ filled with water.
We found a quiet ________ in the park to have our picnic.
Hue is known for its beautiful ancient ________.
You cannot enter the museum ________ a valid ticket.
Spring rolls are considered a local ________ in this city.
To learn English well, you should ________ yourself in the language.
The fear of spiders is ________ in some people's childhood memories.
I bought a small keychain as a ________ of my trip to Paris.
There are many food ________ at the night market selling snacks.
They found ________ ruins buried deep under the modern city.
The castle walls ________ the entire village to keep it safe.
A ________ is a religious building, often very beautiful and old.
The historical ________ of this site makes it very popular with tourists.
We visited the ________ where the famous battle took place.
It's a beautiful ________ for watching the sunset over the lake.
The ________ was once the home of the royal family.
They want to ________ the world and learn about new cultures.
The ________ of the old town are protected by law.
This tradition is ________ in our culture for centuries.
